item.title: Notes: Sinha (2015) Collaborative group engagement in a computer-supported inquiry learning environment
item.description: References Citekey: @Sinha2015 Sinha, S., Rogat, T. K., Adams-Wiggins, K. R., & Hmelo-Silver, C. E. (2015). Collaborative group engagement in a computer-supported inquiry learning environment. International Journal of Computer-Supported Collaborative Learning, 10(3), 273â€“307. doi:10.1007/s11412-015-9218-y Notes Highlights the quality of engagement (p. 273) the quality of behavioral and social engagement differentiated groups demonstrating low quality engagement, but cognitive and conceptual-to-consequential forms are required for explaining high quality engagement. (p. 273)
